channel.title: SASS on Out Of Order Band
channel.description: Recent content in SASS on Out Of Order Band

item.title: Dip your toe into a little SASS!
item.description: Ok…I get the whole CSS pre-processor movement; I don’t need convincing of why it is so good. However, what I do need, is a justification to invest time into learning yet another technology! There is certainly no lack of resources available, for these little beauty’s (Less & Sass): but then there’s a problem for a start – which one?
